price: Enti opue fri pie no mu baa ne nkorͻfoͻ no hͻ, na ͻde nsεnkyerεnee kasa kyerεε wͻn sε: “Momͻ (Nyankopͻn) abodin anͻpa ne anwummerε “.
arabic: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابِ فَأَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَن سَبِّحُواْ بُكۡرَةٗ وَعَشِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fakharaja ʿalā qawmihi mina al-miḥ'rābi fa-awḥā ilayhim an sabbiḥū buk'ratan waʿashiyyan
